Name: Gyro Gear Tournament+
About the game: Fight other competitors and try to make them stop spinning or throw them out of the arena to win. Attack at the right time to deflect damage and jump across the stage to get an advantage point. Figure out how to deal with each character and you'll succeed! Tournament Mode Battle and Race against 8 competitors to be the winner!; Unlock new trophies, endings, characters and outfits. VS Modes Battle against the computer (CP) or against a friend (2P) locally; Choose any character, any outfit and any stage. Profiles Discover more about each character; Review the endings and trophies you've unlocked! Options Set the difficulty settings between Easy, Normal and Hard; Set how many lives you want to use per battle; And more!
